QuestData.Title: Aalgen Point
QuestData.Description:
You wanna hold territory on this chunder puddle of an island, right? Right. That means linkin' up with camps on the outskirts, mate.
I know this bloke called Heidirk. Scrappy fella, loves to get into the thick of it. Headed out to the eastern coast with those drakes of his.
Have a look for him. Remind him he owes me a pint or two!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Heidirk the Scalekeeper at Aalgen Point.
QuestData.RewardText: Chambers sent you? He can down a tankard with the best of 'em, I'll give him that. But if he says I owe him anything, he's a liar!$b$bDon't you worry, my drakes and I will hold the point here. But more of this shore will need to be secured before your campaign can find victory.
